sentences.en: All the jury's eyes were on him as he continued.
sentences.cn: 在他继续陈述的时候，全体陪审员的目光都集中在他身上。

sentences.en: But after nearly a week of deliberations, the jury remained deadlocked.
sentences.cn: 但是经过近一周的审议，陪审团仍然僵持不下。

sentences.en: I am not surprised that the jury chose to award this novel the prize.
sentences.cn: 我并不惊讶于评委选择给这部小说颁奖。

sentences.en: jury-rigged
Last month, a federal grand jury began mulling evidence in the case.
sentences.cn: 联邦大陪审团于上月开始仔细审查本案的证据。

sentences.en: She displayed her wound to the twelve gentlemen of the jury.
sentences.cn: 她给陪审团的12位男士看了她的伤口。

sentences.en: The judge should not have left it to the jury to decide.
sentences.cn: 法官本不该把案子交给陪审团来裁定。

sentences.en: The jury agreed with her, but she lost the case on appeal.
sentences.cn: 陪审团同意她的说法，但在上诉时她败诉了。

sentences.en: The jury found him not guilty.
sentences.cn: 陪审团裁定他无罪。

sentences.en: The jury found that the NFL had violated antitrust laws.
sentences.cn: 陪审团裁决全国橄榄球联盟触犯了反垄断法。

sentences.en: The jury has heard two vastly different accounts of what happened.
sentences.cn: 陪审团听到了对所发生事件的两种截然不同的陈述。

sentences.en: The jury is out on whether or not this is true.
sentences.cn: 这是否属实仍未得出定论。

sentences.en: the jury is still out on whether self-regulation by doctors is adequate.
sentences.cn: 关于医生的自律是否得当的问题仍然悬而未决。

sentences.en: The jury took 23 hours to bring in its verdict.
sentences.cn: 陪审团花了23个小时才作出裁决。

sentences.en: The jury will retire to consider its verdict today.
sentences.cn: 陪审团今天将退庭商议裁决结果。

sentences.en: the members of the jury
sentences.cn: 陪审团成员

sentences.en: the right to trial by jury
sentences.cn: 由陪审团进行审理的权利

sentences.en: The six-person jury deliberated about two hours before returning with the verdict.
sentences.cn: 6人陪审团认真商议了约两个小时后作出了裁定。

sentences.en: The trial will restart today with a new jury.
sentences.cn: 今天，会有新的陪审团重新开始审判。

sentences.en: They have already given evidence before a grand jury in Washington.
sentences.cn: 他们已经在华盛顿的大陪审团前作证。

sentences.en: This jury is expected to be sequestered for at least two months.
sentences.cn: 预计这个陪审团将至少被隔离两个月。

trans.tran_cn: 陪审团，（展览会，竞赛等的）全体评审员，舆论的裁决，评判委员会
trans.tran_en: a group of 12 ordinary people who listen to the details of a case in court and decide whether someone is guilty or not
